actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to phase out the foreign tax credit attributable to taxable income from foreign oil and gas wells.

summary.text: Eliminates, after December 31, 1976, the foreign tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code attributable to taxable income from foreign oil and gas wells.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to phase out the foreign tax credit attributable to taxable income from foreign oil and gas wells.
